mapper.select: /* [PickQpsCompletMapper.xml] selectPickQpsComplet */ SELECT DISTINCT OH.INVOICE_UID_KEY AS invoiceUidKey, OH.SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, OH.INVOICE_NO AS invoiceNo, OH.WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, OH.SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidKey, OH.CELL_ID AS cellId, CASE WHEN LENGTH(OH.ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO) > 21 THEN SUBSTR(OH.ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO,0,20) ELSE OH.ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO END AS originInvoiceNo, OH.ORDMADE_SPLIT_YN AS ordmadeSplitYn, OH.PACK_BOX_SPLIT_YN AS packBoxSplitYn, OH.PACK_BOX_TYPE_RECOM AS packBoxTypeRecom, (CASE WHEN OH.ALLOC_TYPE = 'S' THEN 'Y' ELSE QH.SHIP_ORDER_LAST_YN END) AS shipOrderLastYn, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, OH.MODIFIED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_HDR OH LEFT OUTER JOIN o_wcs.TB_QPS_ORDER_HDR QH ON OH.INVOICE_UID_KEY = QH.INVOICE_UID_KEY, o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_DTL OD WHERE OH.INVOICE_UID_KEY = OD.INVOICE_UID_KEY AND OH.PICK_QPS_CMPT_YN = 'Y' AND OH.PICK_CMPT_INTF_YN = 'N' AND OH.INVOICE_PRINT_SYSTEM = 'WCS' ORDER BY OH.SHIP_ORDER_KEY ASC, OH.INVOICE_NO ASC

/* [PickQpsCompletMapper.xml] selectPickQpsCompletDetail */ SELECT OD.SHIP_ORDER_ITEM_SEQ AS shipOrderItemSeq, OD.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, OD.WORK_BATCH_NO AS workBatchNo, OD.SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidKey, OD.SHIP_UID_ITEM_SEQ AS shipUidItemSeq, OD.SKU_CODE AS skuCode, OD.SKU_NAME AS skuName, OD.SKU_SUB_NAME AS skuSubName, OD.QTY_QPS_PICKED AS qtyQpsPicked, NVL(SUBSTR(QD.SKU_CELL_CMPT_YMD,1,8),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS qpsPickingDate, NVL(SUBSTR(QD.SKU_CELL_CMPT_YMD,9,6),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS')) AS qpsPickingTime, QD.QPS_WORKER_NAME AS qpsWorkerName FROM o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_DTL OD LEFT OUTER JOIn o_wcs.TB_QPS_ORDER_DTL QD ON ( OD.INVOICE_UID_KEY = QD.INVOICE_UID_KEY AND OD.INVOICE_SEQ = QD.INVOICE_SEQ ) WHERE OD.INVOICE_UID_KEY = #{invoiceUidKey} ORDER BY OD.SHIP_ORDER_KEY ASC, OD.SHIP_ORDER_ITEM_SEQ ASC
mapper.update: /* [PickQpsCompletMapper.xml] updatePickQpsComplet */ UPDATE o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_HDR SET PICK_CMPT_INTF_YN = #{pickCmptIntfYn}, PICK_CMPT_INTF_DT = SYSDATE, PICK_CMPT_INTF_CODE = #{pickCmptIntfCode}, PICK_CMPT_INTF_MEMO = #{pickCmptIntfMemo} , MODIFIED_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , MODIFIED_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') , MODIFIED_USER = #{modifiedUser} WHERE INVOICE_UID_KEY = #{invoiceUidKey}
